testsuite.name: Scenario: As​ a client​ I would​ like​ to​ add two​ products​ to​ the​ shopping​ basket.

testcase.classname: Scenario: As​ a client​ I would​ like​ to​ add two​ products​ to​ the​ shopping​ basket.
